Name: Logic Summary
Description: Every time you complete a new quest, you get points in certain categories. Reaching certain amounts of points will give you a new badge! Try out all the activities and see what you can get!

Name: Cat Herder
Description: Find Felix, no matter where he hides...

Name: Lore-ing's not Boring
Description: Unlocked by getting to know the Clubhouse characters through the story activities.

Name: ... Have I met you?
Description: You recognize that cat, like he's from an old dream.

Name: Novice Hacker
Description: Unlocked by exploring the Launch-day content
